Job Title: CFO

Location: Mason City, IA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Description

Robert Half is currently working with a client seeking a CFO. The CFO must have strong analytical, strategic-planning, operational and communication skills, including an ability to work well with the CEO, board members and other senior executives. A combination of industry and public accounting experience is highly valued. Are you an experienced CFO looking for a challenging role at an established company? Then this may be the role for you.

Responsibilities

 Determine if cash flow is appropriate for the organization's operations Sustain relationships with investors and investment institutions Own vendor relationships Recognize and manage insurance requirements and business risks Maintain the integrity of a company's financial information and suggest improvements Direct accounting policies, procedures and internal controls Oversee implementations and upgrades for financial systems Ensure staff compliance with state and federal laws and company's policies Manage hiring and training for accounting and finance staff Provide strategic management of the accounting and finance functions Supervise all finance personnel Manage or oversee the relationship with independent auditors


Requirements

 Excellent leadership and organizational skills Bachelors in Accounting, Finance, or related field required Public accounting experience a plus Proficient in Microsoft Excel 10+ years' experience in accounting or finance Excellent oral and written communications skills MBA, CPA, CGMA or CMA preferred 5+ years' management experience Knowledge of generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP) and IIA standards
